column4: did i mention that my dapper->hardy upgrade left me without a working gui/window environment?
did you skip gutsy?
the computer told me that this would be alright
actually it might have sth to do with this libcairo2 since i get errors that say "undefined symbol: cairo_create_x.._surface"
i'm not sure...
sth. similar to this: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/libcairo/+bug/176318
geez, that bug's a year old
yeah, but that matches the symptoms i have except that libgdk complains about sth else
that's bizarre... someone else might know about it, or you could try searching/posting to ubuntuforums.org
yes, maybe ill do that
ldd
it will show what it's linked to, anyway
that shows me libs that libcairo.so.2 references i guess
objdump -T libcairo.so.2 shows that the "undefined symbol" is in there, so why does the computer complain ?
i suggest http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/web/library/l-shlibs.html  and  http://www.linux.org/docs/ldp/howto/Program-Library-HOWTO/shared-libraries.html
oh, nice
what version of libcairo do you have installed?
dpkg -l | grep ^ii | grep libcairo
yes, its 1.6.0-0ubuntu2
i tried older versions but that didnt really help
that is truely strange, i am not sure where to look next
thank you. maybe Ill get back to you later. thanks
good luck
